Install conpot with docker compose¶

  1. Install docker-compose.

  1. Clone from repository

git clone https://github.com/mushorg/conpot.git

  1. Enter to directory

cd conpot

  1. Edit configuration to connect HPFEEDS

nano conpot/testing.cfg

Edit in the section below, adjust the IP, port, ident, and screet according to the configuration in HPFeeds

  1. Build image with docker compose

docker-compose build

  1. Permanently run as a daemon

docker-compose up -d

  1. Check through the browser whether the conpot is installed successfully

docker-compose up -d

  1. Add ident, screet and channel to mongo hpfeeds according to the previous configuration (assuming hpfeeds has been installed)

python /opt/hpfeeds/broker/add_user.py isifconpot password1234 "conpot.events" ""

  1. Check whether ident, screet and channel have entered Mongo HPfeeds

sudo mongo

show databases

conpot for isif
